attributes.action: prevent Members of Parliament from talking about or voting on subjects about which they have no academic, professional or personal knowledge of.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All too often MPs commentate or vote on issues about which they have no knowledge.  This petition seeks to prevent such actions by MPs.  
We would like to see that politicians display an appropriate degree of knowledge of an issue before passing judgement on it.  Should they not do so they should be prevented from voting and making public statements on the issue.
